name: gemini-nano-banana-tool
description: Generate images using Google Gemini with AI prompt optimization, cost tracking, and multi-turn conversations

commands.name: promptgen
commands.description: Transform simple descriptions into detailed, optimized prompts using AI

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate images from text prompts with optional reference images

commands.name: generate-conversation
commands.description: Multi-turn image generation with progressive refinement

commands.name: list-models
commands.description: List available Gemini image generation models

commands.name: list-aspect-ratios
commands.description: List supported aspect ratios with resolutions

commands.name: completion
commands.description: Generate shell completion scripts for bash, zsh, or fish

skills.name: gemini-nano-banana-tool
skills.description: AI image generation, prompt optimization, cost tracking
